item.title: Dear Julia: An R/STATA User's Journey to Learn
item.description:
I began auditing Tyler Ransom’s structural econometrics course this week. part of the course involves learning to use Julia. I have heard the rumors about Julia’s fantastic speed, so I have decided to really try and learn the language!

I will be documenting my experiences in subsequents posts. The focus will be on how Julia compares in style to R and STATA, the two languages I currently use.

print("Goodbye R world")
## [1] "Goodbye R world"
